argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Cracked and uneven outdoor patio affecting tenant's use of backyard space
argumentsAndDecisions.violatedCode: Section 13 of City's Rent Stabilization and Just Cause for Eviction Ordinance
argumentsAndDecisions.respondentHadNotice: Yes, notified in July and August 2023
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Hearing Officer's inspection confirmed cracked/uneven patio with no visual evidence of claimed repairs
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Conditions more than minor maintenance deficiency but not a habitability violation
